trans-unit.source: This resource sets the access key and secret key that Vault will use when making API requests on behalf of an AWS Auth Backend. It can also be used to override the URLs Vault uses when making those API requests.
trans-unit.target: 该资源设置了Vault代表AWS Auth后端发出API请求时将使用的访问密钥和秘钥。它还可用于覆盖Vault在发出这些API请求时使用的URL。

trans-unit.source: This resource treats its inline rules as absolute; only the rules defined inline are created, and any additions/removals external to this resource will result in diff shown. For these reasons, this resource is incompatible with the aws_security_group_rule resource.
trans-unit.target: 该资源将其内联规则视为绝对规则。仅创建内联定义的规则，并且此资源外部的任何添加/删除都将导致显示差异。由于这些原因，该资源与 aws_security_group_rule 资源不兼容。

trans-unit.source: This resource treats its inline rules as absolute; only the rules defined inline are created, and any additions/removals external to this resource will result in diffs being shown. For these reasons, this resource is incompatible with the aws_network_acl_rule resource.
trans-unit.target: 该资源将其内联规则视为绝对规则。仅创建内联定义的规则，并且此资源外部的任何添加/删除都将导致显示差异。由于这些原因，该资源与 aws_network_acl_rule 资源不兼容。

trans-unit.source: This resource use an orchestration template to define and deploy a multi-container application. An application is created by using an orchestration template. Each application can contain one or more services.
trans-unit.target: 该资源使用编排模板来定义和部署一个多容器应用程序。应用程序是通过使用编排模板创建的。每个应用程序可以包含一个或多个服务。

trans-unit.source: This resource will not pull new layers of the image automatically unless used in conjunction with docker_registry_image data source to update the pull_triggers field.
trans-unit.target: 除非与 docker_registry_image 数据源结合使用以更新 pull_triggers 字段，否则该资源不会自动提取图像的新层。

trans-unit.source: This resource will create an operational server. After this section completes, the provisioner can be called.
trans-unit.target: 该资源将创建一个可运行的服务器。本节完成后,可以调用供应器。

trans-unit.source: This resource will first check if the label exists, and then issue an update, otherwise it will create.
trans-unit.target: 该资源将首先检查标签是否存在,然后发出更新,否则将创建。

trans-unit.source: This resource will help you to manager a Kubernetes Cluster. The cluster is same as container service created by web console.
trans-unit.target: 这个资源将帮助你管理一个Kubernetes集群。该集群与web控制台创建的容器服务相同。

trans-unit.source: This resource will help you to manager a Swarm Cluster.
trans-unit.target: 此资源将帮助您管理Swarm Cluster。

trans-unit.source: This resources provides a way to configure an IP set in NSX. An IP set is a collection of IP addresses. It is often used in the configuration of the NSX firewall.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了在NSX中配置IP集的方法。IP集是一个IP地址的集合。它经常用于配置NSX防火墙。

trans-unit.source: This rule can be used to tell a set to virtual machines to run on different datastores within a cluster, useful for preventing single points of failure in application cluster scenarios. When configured, Storage DRS will make a best effort to ensure that the virtual machines run on different datastores, or prevent any operation that would keep that from happening, depending on the value of the mandatory flag.
trans-unit.target: 此规则可用于告知一组虚拟机在群集内的不同数据存储上运行，这对于防止应用程序群集方案中的单点故障很有用。配置完后，Storage DRS将尽最大努力确保虚拟机在不同的数据存储上运行，或防止任何阻止该操作发生的操作，具体取决于 mandatory 标志的值。

trans-unit.source: This rule can be used to tell a set to virtual machines to run on different hosts within a cluster, useful for preventing single points of failure in application cluster scenarios. When configured, DRS will make a best effort to ensure that the virtual machines run on different hosts, or prevent any operation that would keep that from happening, depending on the value of the mandatory flag.
trans-unit.target: 此规则可用于告知一组虚拟机在群集内的不同主机上运行，​​对于防止应用程序群集方案中的单点故障很有用。配置后，DRS将尽最大努力确保虚拟机在不同的主机上运行，​​或防止任何阻止该操作发生的操作，具体取决于 mandatory 标志的值。

trans-unit.source: This rule can be used to tell a set to virtual machines to run together on a single host within a cluster. When configured, DRS will make a best effort to ensure that the virtual machines run on the same host, or prevent any operation that would keep that from happening, depending on the value of the mandatory flag.
trans-unit.target: 此规则可用于告知一组虚拟机在群集内的单个主机上一起运行。配置完成后，DRS将尽最大努力确保虚拟机在同一主机上运行，​​或防止任何阻止虚拟机发生的操作（取决于 mandatory 标志的值）。

trans-unit.source: This section covers the internals of Terraform and explains how plans are generated, the lifecycle of a provider, etc. The goal of this section is to remove any notion of "magic" from Terraform. We want you to be able to trust and understand what Terraform is doing to function.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍了Terraform的内部结构,并解释了计划是如何生成的,提供者的生命周期等。本节的目标是消除Terraform中任何 "魔法 "的概念。我们希望你能够信任并理解Terraform的功能。

trans-unit.source: This section documents the various backend types supported by Terraform. If you're not familiar with backends, please read the sections about backends first.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍了Terraform支持的各种后端类型。如果您不熟悉后端，请先阅读有关后端的部分。

trans-unit.source: This section documents the various backend types supported by Terraform. If you're not familiar with backends, please read the sections about backends first.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍了Terraform支持的各种后端类型。如果您不熟悉后端，请先阅读有关后端的部分。

trans-unit.source: This section of the documentation gives a high-level overview of how to write plugins for Terraform. It does not hold your hand through the process, however, and expects a relatively high level of understanding of Go, provider semantics, Unix, etc.
trans-unit.target: 本节文档提供了如何为Terraform编写插件的高级概述。不过,它并不会牵着你的手走完整个过程,而是希望你对Go、provider语义、Unix等有比较高的理解。

trans-unit.source: This security group controls networking access to the Kubernetes masters. We will later configure this with an ingress rule to allow traffic from the worker nodes.
trans-unit.target: 这个安全组控制对Kubernetes主站的网络访问。我们稍后会用一个入口规则来配置,以允许来自工人节点的流量。

trans-unit.source: This security group controls networking access to the Kubernetes worker nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该安全组控制对Kubernetes工作节点的网络访问。

trans-unit.source: This setting is a repeatable block, where the block label is a hostname (either app.terraform.io or the hostname of your private install) and the block body contains a token attribute. Whenever Terraform requests module data from that hostname, it will authenticate with that token.
trans-unit.target: 此设置是可重复的块，其中块标签为主机名（ app.terraform.io 或您的私人安装的主机名），并且块主体包含 token 属性。每当Terraform从该主机名请求模块数据时，它将使用该令牌进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This setup will ensure that the HTTPS Load Balancer stack is not created before the Let's Encrypt's certificate is actually present in Rancher's certificates manager.
trans-unit.target: 此设置将确保在Let's Encrypt的证书实际存在于Rancher的证书管理器之前,不会创建HTTPS负载平衡器栈。

trans-unit.source: This setup will ensure that the Load Balancer stack is not created before the Let's Encrypt's certificate is actually present in Rancher's certificates manager.
trans-unit.target: 这种设置将确保在Let's Encrypt的证书实际存在于Rancher的证书管理器之前,不会创建负载平衡器栈。

trans-unit.source: This snippet creates a customized IAM organization role.
trans-unit.target: 这个片段创建了一个自定义的IAM组织角色。

trans-unit.source: This snippet creates a customized IAM role.
trans-unit.target: 这个片段创建了一个自定义的IAM角色。

trans-unit.source: This snippet creates a service account, then gives it objectViewer permission in a project.
trans-unit.target: 这段代码创建了一个服务账户,然后在项目中赋予它objectViewer权限。

trans-unit.target: 此特殊参数适用于所有提供程序。 terraform providers 可用于查看当前配置中使用的所有提供程序的指定版本约束。

trans-unit.source: This state is stored by default in a local file named "terraform.tfstate", but it can also be stored remotely, which works better in a team environment.
trans-unit.target: 这个状态默认存储在一个名为 "terraform.tfstate "的本地文件中,但它也可以远程存储,这在团队环境中效果更好。

trans-unit.source: This targeting capability is provided for exceptional circumstances, such as recovering from mistakes or working around Terraform limitations. It is not recommended to use -target for routine operations, since this can lead to undetected configuration drift and confusion about how the true state of resources relates to configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此定位功能是在特殊情况下提供的，例如从错误中恢复或解决Terraform限制。这是不推荐使用 -target 用于常规操作，因为这可能会导致漏检配置偏差和混乱有关资源的真实状况如何与配置。

trans-unit.source: This template/solution are released under an as-is, best effort, support policy. These scripts should be seen as community supported and Palo Alto Networks will contribute our expertise as and when possible. We do not provide technical support or help in using or troubleshooting the components of the project through our normal support options such as Palo Alto Networks support teams, or ASC (Authorized Support Centers) partners and backline support options. The underlying product used (the VM-Series firewall) by the scripts or templates are still supported, but the support is only for the product functionality and not for help in deploying or using the template or script itself. Unless explicitly tagged, all projects or work posted in our GitHub repository (at https://github.com/PaloAltoNetworks) or sites other than our official Downloads page on https://support.paloaltonetworks.com are provided under the best effort policy.
trans-unit.target: 此模板/解决方案是按原样，尽力而为，支持策略发布的。这些脚本应视为社区支持的，并且Palo Alto Networks将在可能的情况下贡献我们的专业知识。我们不会通过常规支持选项（例如Palo Alto Networks支持团队或ASC（授权支持中心）合作伙伴和后勤支持选项）为使用或对项目组件进行故障排除提供技术支持或帮助。仍支持脚本或模板使用的基础产品（VM系列防火墙），但是该支持仅针对产品功能，而不是对部署或使用模板或脚本本身的帮助。除非明确标记，否则所有项目或工作都将发布在我们的GitHub存储库中（位于https://github.com/PaloAltoNetworks）或https://support.paloaltonetworks.com上我们官方下载页面以外的网站是根据“尽力而为”政策提供的。

trans-unit.source: This uses the schema.Resource type. This structure defines the data schema and CRUD operations for the resource. Defining these properties are the only required thing to create a resource.
trans-unit.target: 这使用 schema.Resource 类型。此结构定义了资源的数据模式和CRUD操作。定义这些属性是创建资源的唯一必需的事情。

trans-unit.source: This uses the schema.ResourceData API to get the value of "address" provided by the user in the Terraform configuration. Due to the way Go works, we have to typecast it to string. This is a safe operation, however, since our schema guarantees it will be a string type.
trans-unit.target: 这使用 schema.ResourceData API 来获取用户在Terraform配置中提供的 "address" 的值。由于Go的工作方式，我们必须将其类型转换为字符串。但是，这是安全的操作，因为我们的架构保证它将是字符串类型。

trans-unit.source: This will not modify your infrastructure. This command removes the lock on the state for the current configuration. The behavior of this lock is dependent on the backend being used. Local state files cannot be unlocked by another process.
trans-unit.target: 这不会修改您的基础设施。该命令将删除当前配置的状态锁。这个锁的行为取决于所使用的后端。本地状态文件不能被其他进程解锁。

trans-unit.target: 如果S3对象以某种方式发生变化,这将不会重新创建资源。它只用于初始化数据库。

trans-unit.source: To avoid accidentally clobbering matching data that existed in Consul before a consul_key_prefix resource was created, creation of a key prefix instance will fail if any matching keys are already present in the key/value store. If any conflicting data is present, you must first delete it manually.
trans-unit.target: 为避免在创建 consul_key_prefix 资源之前意外破坏Consul中存在的匹配数据，如果键/值存储中已存在任何匹配的键，则键前缀实例的创建将失败。如果存在任何冲突的数据，则必须首先手动将其删除。

trans-unit.source: To be extra careful, we always recommend manually backing up your state as well. You can do this by simply copying your terraform.tfstate file to another location. The initialization process should create a backup as well, but it never hurts to be safe!
trans-unit.target: 为格外小心，我们始终建议您也手动备份您的状态。您只需将 terraform.tfstate 文件复制到另一个位置即可。初始化过程也应该创建一个备份，但是安全无虞！

trans-unit.source: To declare multiple tags additional tag blocks can be specified. Alternatively the tags attributes can be used, which accepts a list of maps containing the above field names as keys and their respective values. This allows the construction of dynamic lists of tags which is not possible using the single tag attribute. tag and tags are mutually exclusive, only one of them can be specified.

trans-unit.source: To delete an workspace, it must already exist, it must have an empty state, and it must not be your current workspace. If the workspace state is not empty, Terraform will not allow you to delete it unless the -force flag is specified.

trans-unit.source: To protect you, the force-unlock command requires a unique lock ID. Terraform will output this lock ID if unlocking fails. This lock ID acts as a nonce, ensuring that locks and unlocks target the correct lock.
trans-unit.target: 为了保护您， force-unlock 命令需要唯一的锁定ID。如果解锁失败，Terraform将输出此锁定ID。此锁ID用作随机数，确保锁定和解锁目标为正确的锁。

trans-unit.source: To reduce the exposure of such secrets, the provider requests a Vault token with a relatively-short TTL (20 minutes, by default) which in turn means that where possible Vault will revoke any issued credentials after that time, but in particular it is unable to retract any static secrets such as those stored in Vault's "generic" secret backend.
trans-unit.target: 为了减少此类秘密的暴露,提供商要求Vault令牌具有相对较短的TTL(默认情况下为20分钟),这反过来又意味着在可能的情况下,Vault将在该时间之后撤销任何已发布的凭证,但特别是它无法收回任何静态秘密,例如存储在Vault的 "通用 "秘密后端的秘密。

trans-unit.source: Unconstrained randomness within a Terraform configuration would not be very useful, since Terraform's goal is to converge on a fixed configuration by applying a diff. Because of this, the "random" provider provides an idea of managed randomness: it provides resources that generate random values during their creation and then hold those values steady until the inputs are changed.
trans-unit.target: Terraform配置中不受约束的随机性不是很有用，因为Terraform的目标是通过应用diff收敛于固定配置。因此，“随机”提供程序提供了一种管理随机性的思想：它提供了在创建过程中会生成随机值，然后保持这些值稳定直到输入被更改的资源。

trans-unit.source: Unlike in this simple example you'd commonly run more than a single instance of your application in production to reach high availability and adding labels will allow Kubernetes to find all pods (instances) for the purpose of forwarding the traffic to the exposed port.
trans-unit.target: 与这个简单的例子不同的是,你通常会在生产中运行多个应用实例来达到高可用性,而添加标签会让Kubernetes找到所有的pod(实例),以便将流量转发到暴露的端口。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other RDS resources that support replication, with Amazon Aurora you do not designate a primary and subsequent replicas. Instead, you simply add RDS Instances and Aurora manages the replication. You can use the count meta-parameter to make multiple instances and join them all to the same RDS Cluster, or you may specify different Cluster Instance resources with various instance_class sizes.
trans-unit.target: 与其他支持复制的RDS资源不同，使用Amazon Aurora，您无需指定主副本和后续副本。相反，您只需添加RDS实例，Aurora即可管理复制。您可以使用count元参数来创建多个实例，并将它们全部加入同一RDS群集，也可以使用各种 instance_class 大小指定不同的Cluster Instance资源。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other resources in the "random" provider, this resource does use a cryptographic random number generator in order to minimize the chance of collisions, making the results of this resource when a 32-byte identifier is requested of equivalent uniqueness to a type-4 UUID.
trans-unit.target: 与“随机”提供程序中的其他资源不同，此资源的确使用了密码随机数生成器，以最大程度地减少冲突的机会，当请求一个32字节的标识符具有与Type-4等效的唯一性时，使该资源的结果UUID。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the vSphere client, many resources in the vSphere Terraform provider take Managed Object IDs (or UUIDs when provided and practical) when referring to placement parameters and upstream resources. This provides a stable interface for providing necessary data to downstream resources, in addition to minimizing the bugs that can arise from the flexibility in how an individual object's name or inventory path can be supplied.
trans-unit.target: 与 vSphere 客户端不同,vSphere Terraform 提供商中的许多资源在引用放置参数和上游资源时,都会采取托管对象 ID(或提供且实用时的 UUID)。这为向下游资源提供必要的数据提供了一个稳定的接口,此外还最大限度地减少了因如何灵活提供单个对象的名称或库存路径而可能产生的错误。

trans-unit.source: Updates for file paths are automatic: when "downloading" the module using the get command, Terraform will create a symbolic link to the original directory. Therefore, any changes are automatically available.
trans-unit.target: 文件路径的更新是自动的：使用get命令 “下载”模块时，Terraform将创建指向原始目录的符号链接。因此，任何更改都将自动可用。

trans-unit.source: Updates to destination parameters such as datacenter, datastore, or destination_file will move the managed file a new destination based on the values of the new settings. If any source parameter is changed, such as source_datastore, source_datacenter or source_file), the resource will be re-created. Depending on if destination parameters are being changed as well, this may result in the destination file either being overwritten or deleted at the old location.
trans-unit.target: 对目标参数（例如 datacenter ， datastore 或 destination_file )的更新将根据新设置的值将托管文件移动到新的目标。如果更改了任何源参数，例如 source_datastore ， source_datacenter 或 source_file ），将重新创建资源。根据目标参数是否也被更改，这可能导致目标文件在旧位置被覆盖或删除。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to access the properties of an existing Azure Public IP Address.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源可访问现有 Azure 公共 IP 地址的属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to create a Shared Access Signature (SAS) for an Azure Storage Account.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源为 Azure 存储账户创建共享访问签名 (SAS)。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to generate a Glue script from a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG).
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源从定向无环图(DAG)生成Glue脚本。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get CIDR expression for precreated IPv6 and IPv4 blocks in Packet. You can then use the cidrsubnet TF builtin function to derive subnets.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源来获取Packet中预创建的IPv6和IPv4块的CIDR表达式。然后,您可以使用cidrsubnet TF内置函数来推导子网。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get DNS A records of the host.
trans-unit.target: 使用该数据源获取主机的DNS A记录。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get DNS AAAA records of the host.
trans-unit.target: 使用该数据源获取主机的DNS AAAA记录。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get DNS CNAME record set of the host.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源获取主机的DNS CNAME记录集。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get DNS PTR record set of the ip address.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源获取ip地址的DNS PTR记录集。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get DNS TXT record set of the host.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源获取主机的DNS TXT记录集。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get DNS ns records of the host.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源获取主机的DNS ns记录。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get IDs and VPC membership of Security Groups that are created outside of Terraform.
trans-unit.target: 使用该数据源获取在Terraform之外创建的安全组的ID和VPC成员资格。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get IDs or IPs of Amazon EC2 instances to be referenced elsewhere, e.g. to allow easier migration from another management solution or to make it easier for an operator to connect through bastion host(s).
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源可获得要在其他地方引用的 Amazon EC2 实例的 ID 或 IP,例如,允许更容易地从另一个管理解决方案迁移,或使操作员更容易通过堡垒主机进行连接。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get a list of AMI IDs matching the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源获取与指定标准相匹配的AMI ID列表。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get a list of EBS Snapshot IDs matching the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源可获得与指定标准相匹配的EBS快照ID列表。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get a list of cognito user pools.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个数据源来获取cognito用户池的列表。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get authentication information about the current auth scope in use. This can be used as self-discovery or introspection of the username or project name currently in use.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个数据源来获取当前使用的auth scope的认证信息。这可以作为当前使用的用户名或项目名称的自我发现或反省。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get detailed information about the specified KMS Key with flexible key id input. This can be useful to reference key alias without having to hard code the ARN as input.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源,可以灵活地输入密钥ID,获取指定KMS密钥的详细信息。这对参考密钥别名很有用,而不必硬编码ARN作为输入。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get information (like ID) of already existing Logentries LogSets.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源获取已经存在的 Logentries LogSets 的信息(如 ID)。

trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源获取有关Heroku私有空间的信息。

trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源来获取DB快照的信息,以便在供应DB实例时使用。

trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源获取有关可用于服务的特定扩展供应商的信息（例如：Slack，Generic Webhook，ServiceNow）。

trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源获取有关可用于其他PagerDuty资源的特定计划的信息。

trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源来获取有关可用于其他PagerDuty资源的特定用户的信息。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get the ARN and URL of queue in AWS Simple Queue Service (SQS). By using this data source, you can reference SQS queues without having to hardcode the ARNs as input.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源可获得AWS简单队列服务(SQS)中队列的ARN和URL。通过使用此数据源,您可以引用SQS队列,而无需将ARN硬编码为输入。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get the ARN of a KMS key alias. By using this data source, you can reference key alias without having to hard code the ARN as input.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源可以获得KMS密钥别名的ARN。通过使用此数据源,您可以引用密钥别名,而无需将ARN硬编码作为输入。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get the ARN of a certificate in AWS Certificate Manager (ACM). The process of requesting and verifying a certificate in ACM requires some manual steps, which means that Terraform cannot automate the creation of ACM certificates. But using this data source, you can reference them by domain without having to hard code the ARNs as input.
trans-unit.target: 使用该数据源可以获得AWS证书管理器(ACM)中证书的ARN。在ACM中请求和验证证书的过程需要一些手工步骤,这意味着Terraform无法自动创建ACM证书。但是使用这个数据源,你可以通过域来参考,而不需要将ARN硬编码作为输入。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get the ARN of a topic in AWS Simple Notification Service (SNS). By using this data source, you can reference SNS topics without having to hard code the ARNs as input.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源可获得 AWS 简单通知服务 (SNS)中主题的 ARN。通过使用此数据源,您可以引用 SNS 主题,而无需将 ARN 硬编码作为输入。

trans-unit.source: Use this data source to get the Account ID of the AWS Billing and Cost Management Service Account for the purpose of whitelisting in S3 bucket policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用此数据源获取AWS Billing and Cost Management Service账户的账户ID，以便在S3存储桶策略中将其列入白名单。

trans-unit.source: Use this section as a starting-point for your approach, but note that you will probably need to make adjustments for the unique standards and regulations that apply to your organization. You will also need to make some adjustments to this approach to account for existing practices within your organization, if for example other tools have previously been used to manage infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 将本节用作您的方法的起点，但是请注意，您可能需要针对适用于您的组织的独特标准和法规进行调整。如果例如以前使用其他工具来管理基础结构，则您还需要对该方法进行一些调整，以考虑组织中的现有实践。

trans-unit.source: Use your password instead of your Rackspace API KEY.
trans-unit.target: 使用密码代替Rackspace API密钥。

trans-unit.source: Used to represent an ordered collection of items, where the order the items are presented can impact the behavior of the resource being modeled. An example of ordered items would be network routing rules, where rules are examined in the order they are given until a match is found. The items are all of the same type defined by the Elem property.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示项目的有序集合，其中项目的显示顺序可能会影响正在建模的资源的行为。排序项目的一个示例是网络路由规则，其中按给出的顺序检查规则，直到找到匹配项。这些项目都是 Elem 属性定义的相同类型。

trans-unit.source: Version Control Providers
trans-unit.target: 版本控制供应商

trans-unit.source: Version constraints are supported only for modules installed from a module registry, such as the Terraform Registry or Terraform Enterprise's private module registry. Other module sources can provide their own versioning mechanisms within the source string itself, or might not support versions at all. In particular, modules sourced from local file paths do not support version; since they're loaded from the same source repository, they always share the same version as their caller.
trans-unit.target: 仅从模块注册表（例如Terraform注册表或Terraform Enterprise的私有模块注册表）安装的模块才支持版本限制。其他模块源可以在源字符串本身中提供自己的版本控制机制，或者可能根本不支持版本。特别是，从本地文件路径获取的模块不支持 version ；由于它们是从相同的源存储库加载的，因此它们始终与调用者共享相同的版本。

trans-unit.source: Virtual device resources (disk, network_interface, and cdrom) all export the following attributes. These options help locate the sub-resource on future Terraform runs. The options are:
trans-unit.target: 虚拟设备资源（ disk ， network_interface 和 cdrom ）全部导出以下属性。这些选项有助于在将来的Terraform运行中找到子资源。选项包括：

trans-unit.source: Virtual disks are managed by adding an instance of the disk sub-resource.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加 disk 子资源的实例来管理虚拟磁盘。

trans-unit.source: Virtual disks can be SCSI disks only. The SCSI controllers managed by Terraform can vary, depending on the value supplied to scsi_controller_count. This also dictates the controllers that are checked when looking for disks during a cloning process. By default, this value is 1, meaning that you can have up to 15 disks configured on a virtual machine. These are all configured with the controller type defined by the scsi_type setting. If you are cloning from a template, devices will be added or re-configured as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟磁盘只能是SCSI磁盘。Terraform管理的SCSI控制器可以变化，具体取决于提供给 scsi_controller_count 的值。这也决定了在克隆过程中寻找磁盘时要检查的控制器。默认情况下，此值为 1 ，这意味着您最多可以在虚拟机上配置15个磁盘。这些都使用 scsi_type 设置定义的控制器类型进行配置。如果要从模板克隆，则将根据需要添加或重新配置设备。

trans-unit.source: Virtual machine (VM) instances in a VPC network can communicate with instances in all other subnets of the same VPC network, regardless of region, using their RFC1918 private IP addresses. You can isolate portions of the network, even entire subnets, using firewall rules.
trans-unit.target: VPC 网络中的虚拟机 (VM)实例可以使用它们的 RFC1918 私有 IP 地址与同一 VPC 网络中的所有其他子网中的实例进行通信,不受区域限制。您可以使用防火墙规则隔离网络的一部分,甚至整个子网。

trans-unit.source: Warning! It is highly recommended that you enable Object Versioning by setting the expire_after configuration. This allows for state recovery in the case of accidental deletions and human error.

trans-unit.source: We are always happy when any developer is interested in diving into Terraform's core to help out! Here's what we look for in smaller Core PRs.
trans-unit.target: 如果有开发者有兴趣深入Terraform的核心,我们总是很乐意提供帮助。以下是我们对小型核心PR的要求。

trans-unit.source: We can just replace our Pod with RC from the previous config and keep the Service there.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以把之前配置的Pod换成RC,然后把Service保留在那里。

trans-unit.source: We can now create the Service Principal which will have permissions to manage resources in the specified Subscription using the following command:
trans-unit.target: 现在我们可以使用以下命令创建服务委托人,该委托人将拥有管理指定订阅中资源的权限。

trans-unit.source: We can then instantiate the module multiple times in our configuration by giving each instance a unique name -- here module "assets_bucket" and module "media_bucket" -- whilst specifying the same source value.
trans-unit.target: 然后，我们可以通过为每个实例指定一个唯一的名称（此处为 module "assets_bucket" 和 module "media_bucket" ，同时指定相同的 source 值，来在实例中多次实例化模块。

trans-unit.source: We currently have 1600 issues for AWS.
trans-unit.target: 我们目前有1600期AWS。

trans-unit.source: We have some amazing contributors to AWS and want to get them more involved. This allows people with all levels of AWS knowledge to participate from small, medium, and larger infrastructures. Beginners will have an opportunity to get positive support from more advanced users and HashiCorp will provide participants for quick knowledge.
trans-unit.target: 我们有一些了不起的AWS贡献者,希望让他们更多地参与进来。这使得拥有各种水平的AWS知识的人都可以从小型、中型和大型基础设施中参与进来。初学者将有机会从更高级的用户那里获得积极的支持,HashiCorp将为参与者提供快速知识。

trans-unit.source: We make the distinction between these two types of providers to help highlight the vast amounts of community effort that goes in to making Terraform great, and to help contributors better understand the role HashiCorp employees play in the various areas of the code base.
trans-unit.target: 我们区分这两种类型的提供者,是为了突出强调社区为Terraform所做的大量努力,也是为了帮助贡献者更好地理解HashiCorp员工在代码库的各个领域所扮演的角色。

trans-unit.source: We may also add an output which will expose the IP address to the user
trans-unit.target: 我们还可以添加一个输出,将IP地址暴露给用户。

trans-unit.source: We really appreciate the communities feedback, help and participation. We also want to make sure we are bring you along with our roadmap and listening to your feedback about what business problems you are running into so that we can adjust quicker.
trans-unit.target: 我们非常感谢社区的反馈、帮助和参与。我们也希望确保我们能带着你一起走在我们的路线图上,并倾听你的反馈,了解你遇到的业务问题,以便我们能更快地调整。

trans-unit.source: We recommend using a Service Principal when running in a shared environment (such as within a CI server/automation) - and authenticating via the Azure CLI when you're running Terraform locally.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议在共享环境中（例如，在CI服务器/自动化中）运行时使用服务主体 - 在本地运行Terraform时通过Azure CLI进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: We recommend using a Service Principal when running in a shared environment (such as within a CI server/automation) - and authenticating via the Azure CLI when you're running Terraform locally.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议在共享环境中（例如，在CI服务器/自动化中）运行时使用服务主体 -在本地运行Terraform时通过Azure CLI进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: We recommend using a Service Principal when running in a shared environment (such as within a CI server/automation) - and authenticating via the Azure CLI when you're running Terraform locally.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议在共享环境中（例如，在CI服务器/自动化中）运行时使用服务主体 - 在本地运行Terraform时通过Azure CLI进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: We recommend explicitly constraining the acceptable version numbers for each external module to avoid unexpected or unwanted changes.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议明确限制每个外部模块的可接受版本号,以避免意外或不必要的更改。

trans-unit.source: We recommend using a Service Principal when running in a shared environment (such as within a CI server/automation) - and authenticating via the Azure CLI when you're running Terraform locally.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议在共享环境中（例如，在CI服务器/自动化中）运行时使用服务主体- 在本地运行Terraform时通过Azure CLI进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: We recommend using modules from the public Terraform Registry or from Terraform Enterprise's private module registry. These sources support version constraints for a more reliable experience, and provide a searchable marketplace for finding the modules you need.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议使用来自公共Terraform注册表或Terraform Enterprise的私有模块注册表的模块。这些资源支持版本限制以获得更可靠的体验，并提供可搜索的市场来查找所需的模块。

trans-unit.source: We recommend viewing schemas of existing or similar providers to learn best practices. A good starting place is the core Terraform providers.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议查看现有或类似提供程序的架构以了解最佳做法。核心Terraform提供商是一个很好的起点。

trans-unit.source: We separate providers out into what we call "HashiCorp Providers" and "Community Providers".
trans-unit.target: 我们将供应商分为 "HashiCorp供应商 "和 "社区供应商"。

trans-unit.source: We support instance persistence via the following configurations. all values are boolean. For more information on instance persistence please see: Stateful configuration
trans-unit.target: 我们通过以下配置支持实例持久性。所有值均为布尔值。有关实例持久性的更多信息，请参见：有状态配置

trans-unit.source: We welcome issues of all kinds including feature requests, bug reports, and general questions. The code and issue tracker for Terraform is at https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform. Each officially supported Terraform Provider has its own GitHub repository in the Terraform Providers GitHub Organization.
trans-unit.target: 我们欢迎各种问题，包括功能请求，错误报告和一般性问题。Terraform的代码和问题跟踪器位于https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform。每个官方支持的Terraform Provider在Terraform Providers GitHub Organization中都有自己的GitHub存储库。

trans-unit.source: We will have a Gitter room available at hashicorp-terraform/gardening and a someone from HashiCorp on Zoom conferencing through out the time zones.
trans-unit.target: 我们将在 hashicorp-terraform/gardening 提供一个Gitter会议室，还有一个来自HashiCorp的在Zoom上进行跨时区会议的人员。

trans-unit.target: WebLogic服务器端口支持以下内容。

trans-unit.target: WebLogic服务器支持以下内容:

trans-unit.source: Weeding
trans-unit.target: Weeding

trans-unit.source: Weekly: Multiple values can be filled. The values of Sunday to Saturday are 0 to 6 in sequence. Multiple values shall be separated by a comma “,”.
trans-unit.target: 每周：可以填写多个值。周日至周六的值顺序为0至6。多个值之间应以逗号“，”分隔。

trans-unit.source: Weekly: Recurrence interval by week for a scheduled task.
trans-unit.target: 每周。排定任务每周重复出现的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Weighted routing policies support the following:
trans-unit.target: 加权路由策略支持以下内容:

trans-unit.source: Weighted routing policy
trans-unit.target: 加权路由策略

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the Terraform documentation! This documentation is more of a reference guide for all available features and options of Terraform. If you're just getting started with Terraform, please start with the introduction and getting started guide instead.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎使用Terraform文档！该文档更多地是Terraform的所有可用功能和选项的参考指南。如果您只是开始使用Terraform，请先从介绍和入门指南开始。

trans-unit.source: What do we plan to do first?
trans-unit.target: 我们打算先做什么?

trans-unit.source: What to Expect
trans-unit.target: 期待什么

trans-unit.source: What we are giving away for participating?
trans-unit.target: 参与活动我们送什么?

trans-unit.source: When modules are used, all Terraform version requirements specified by the complete module tree must be satisified. This means that the required_version setting can be used by a module to require that all consumers of a module also use a specific version.
trans-unit.target: 使用模块时，必须满足完整模块树所指定的所有Terraform版本要求。这意味着模块可以使用 required_version 设置，以要求模块的所有使用者也都使用特定版本。

trans-unit.source: When using registry modules, there is no difference between a verified and unverified module; they are used the same way.
trans-unit.target: 当使用注册表模块，有一种验证和未经验证的模块之间没有差异; 它们的使用方式相同。

trans-unit.source: When DefaultFunc will be used to compute a dynamic default for this element. The return value of this function should be "stable", such that it is uncommon to return different values in subsequent plans without any other changes being made, to avoid unnecessary diffs in terraform plan.
trans-unit.target: 当 DefaultFunc 用于计算此元素的动态默认值时。该函数的返回值应该是“稳定的”，这样在不进行任何其他更改的情况下，在后续计划中返回不同的值并不常见，以避免在 terraform plan 产生不必要的差异。

trans-unit.source: When terraform init is re-run with providers already installed, it will use an already-installed provider that meets the constraints in preference to downloading a new version. To upgrade to the latest acceptable version of each provider, run terraform init -upgrade. This command also upgrades to the latest versions of all Terraform modules.
trans-unit.target: 当在已安装提供程序的情况下重新运行 terraform init 时，它将优先使用符合条件的已安装提供程序，而不是下载新版本。要升级到每个提供程序的最新可接受版本，请运行 terraform init -upgrade 。此命令还将升级到所有Terraform模块的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: When terraform init is run without provider version constraints, it prints a suggested version constraint string for each provider:
trans-unit.target: 在没有提供程序版本约束的情况下运行 terraform init 时，它将为每个提供程序打印建议的版本约束字符串：

trans-unit.source: When virtualization_type is "hvm" the following additional arguments apply:
trans-unit.target: 当 virtualization_type 为“ hvm”时，以下附加参数适用：

trans-unit.source: When virtualization_type is "paravirtual" the following additional arguments apply:
trans-unit.target: 当 virtualization_type 为“准虚拟”时，以下附加参数适用：

trans-unit.source: When Terraform first adopts the Default Network ACL, it immediately removes all rules in the ACL. It then proceeds to create any rules specified in the configuration. This step is required so that only the rules specified in the configuration are created.
trans-unit.target: Terraform首次采用默认网络ACL时，会立即删除 ACL 中的所有规则。然后，它将继续创建配置中指定的任何规则。需要执行此步骤，以便仅创建配置中指定的规则。

trans-unit.source: When Terraform first adopts the Default Route Table, it immediately removes all defined routes. It then proceeds to create any routes specified in the configuration. This step is required so that only the routes specified in the configuration present in the Default Route Table.
trans-unit.target: Terraform首次采用默认路由表时，会立即删除所有已定义的路由。然后，它将继续创建配置中指定的任何路由。需要执行此步骤，以便仅默认配置表中存在的配置中指定的路由。

trans-unit.source: When Terraform first adopts the Default Security Group, it immediately removes all ingress and egress rules in the Security Group. It then proceeds to create any rules specified in the configuration. This step is required so that only the rules specified in the configuration are created.
trans-unit.target: Terraform首次采用默认安全组时，它将立即删除安全组中的所有入口和出口规则。然后，它将继续创建配置中指定的任何规则。需要执行此步骤，以便仅创建配置中指定的规则。

trans-unit.source: When Terraform is used to manage larger systems, teams should use multiple separate Terraform configurations that correspond with suitable architectural boundaries within the system so that different components can be managed separately and, if appropriate, by distinct teams. Workspaces alone are not a suitable tool for system decomposition, because each subsystem should have its own separate configuration and backend, and will thus have its own distinct set of workspaces.
trans-unit.target: 当使用Terraform来管理较大的系统时，团队应使用与系统内适当的体系结构边界相对应的多个单独的Terraform配置，以便可以分别管理不同的组件，如果合适，可以由不同的团队进行管理。单独的工作区并不是适用于系统分解的工具，因为每个子系统都应具有其自己的单独配置和后端，因此将具有其自己独特的工作区集。

trans-unit.source: When a 4xx or 5xx status code is returned. The response payload will look like the following example:
trans-unit.target: 当 4xx 或 5xx 返回状态代码。响应有效负载将类似于以下示例：

trans-unit.source: When a postgresql_role resource is removed, the PostgreSQL ROLE will automatically run a REASSIGN OWNED and DROP OWNED to the CURRENT_USER (normally the connected user for the provider). If the specified PostgreSQL ROLE owns objects in multiple PostgreSQL databases in the same PostgreSQL Cluster, one PostgreSQL provider per database must be created and all but the final postgresql_role must specify a skip_drop_role.
trans-unit.target: 当 postgresql_role 资源被移除时，PostgreSQL的作用将自动运行 REASSIGN OWNED 和 DROP OWNED 到 CURRENT_USER （通常为提供者连接的用户）。如果指定的PostgreSQL ROLE在同一个PostgreSQL集群中的多个PostgreSQL数据库中拥有对象，则必须为每个数据库创建一个PostgreSQL提供程序，除最终的 postgresql_role 之外，所有其他提供商都必须指定 skip_drop_role 。

trans-unit.source: When a VPC is created, a primary IPv4 CIDR block for the VPC must be specified. The aws_vpc_ipv4_cidr_block_association resource allows further IPv4 CIDR blocks to be added to the VPC.
trans-unit.target: 创建VPC时，必须指定VPC的主要IPv4 CIDR块。该 aws_vpc_ipv4_cidr_block_association 资源允许进一步的IPv4 CIDR块添加到VPC。

trans-unit.source: When a configuration uses modules, they must first be installed by running terraform init:
trans-unit.target: 当配置使用模块时，必须首先通过运行 terraform init 来安装它们：

trans-unit.source: When a cross-account (requester's AWS account differs from the accepter's AWS account) or an inter-region VPC Peering Connection is created, a VPC Peering Connection resource is automatically created in the accepter's account. The requester can use the aws_vpc_peering_connection resource to manage its side of the connection and the accepter can use the aws_vpc_peering_connection_accepter resource to "adopt" its side of the connection into management.
trans-unit.target: 当跨账户（请求者的AWS账户与接受者的AWS账户不同）或创建区域间VPC对等连接时，会在接受者的账户中自动创建VPC对等连接资源。请求者可以使用 aws_vpc_peering_connection 资源来管理其连接的一侧，而接受者可以使用 aws_vpc_peering_connection_accepter 资源来“采用”其连接的一侧进行管理。

trans-unit.source: When a custom port number is present, the service on that port is expected to implement HTTPS and respond to the same fixed discovery path.
trans-unit.target: 当存在自定义端口号时,希望该端口上的服务能实现HTTPS并响应相同的固定发现路径。

trans-unit.source: When a plugin cache directory is enabled, the terraform init command will still access the plugin distribution server to obtain metadata about which plugins are available, but once a suitable version has been selected it will first check to see if the selected plugin is already available in the cache directory. If so, the already-downloaded plugin binary will be used.
trans-unit.target: 启用插件缓存目录后， terraform init 命令仍将访问插件分发服务器以获取有关可用插件的元数据，但是一旦选择了合适的版本，它将首先检查所选插件是否已在缓存目录。如果是这样，将使用已经下载的插件二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: When a resource depends on a module, everything in that module must be created before the resource is created.
trans-unit.target: 当资源依赖于模块时，必须在创建资源之前创建该模块中的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: When applied, an invitation will be sent to the user to become a collaborator on a repository. When destroyed, either the invitation will be cancelled or the collaborator will be removed from the repository.
trans-unit.target: 应用时,将向用户发出邀请,使其成为存储库的合作者。销毁时,要么取消邀请,要么将合作者从版本库中删除。

trans-unit.source: When applying a policy that does not include the roles listed below, you lose the default permissions which google adds to your bucket: * roles/storage.legacyBucketOwner * roles/storage.legacyBucketReader
trans-unit.target: 当应用不包含以下角色的策略时，您将失去Google添加到存储桶中的默认权限：* roles/storage.legacyBucketOwner * roles/storage.legacyBucketReader

trans-unit.source: When attaching an Instance to one or more networks using Ports, place the security groups on the Port and not the Instance. If you place the security groups on the Instance, the security groups will not be applied upon creation, but they will be applied upon a refresh. This is a known FlexibleEngine bug.
trans-unit.target: 当使用端口将实例附加到一个或多个网络时,请将安全组放在端口上,而不是实例上。如果您将安全组放置在实例上,安全组将不会在创建时应用,但它们将在刷新时应用。这是一个已知的 FlexibleEngine 错误。

trans-unit.source: When attaching an Instance to one or more networks using Ports, place the security groups on the Port and not the Instance. If you place the security groups on the Instance, the security groups will not be applied upon creation, but they will be applied upon a refresh. This is a known OpenStack bug.
trans-unit.target: 当使用端口将实例附加到一个或多个网络时,请将安全组放在端口上,而不是实例上。如果您将安全组放置在实例上,则安全组不会在创建时应用,但会在刷新时应用。这是一个已知的 OpenStack 错误。

trans-unit.source: When attaching an Instance to one or more networks using Ports, place the security groups on the Port and not the Instance. If you place the security groups on the Instance, the security groups will not be applied upon creation, but they will be applied upon a refresh. This is a known OpenTelekomCloud bug.
trans-unit.target: 当使用端口将实例附加到一个或多个网络时,请将安全组放在端口上,而不是实例上。如果您将安全组放置在实例上,安全组将不会在创建时应用,但它们将在刷新时应用。这是一个已知的OpenTelekomCloud错误。

trans-unit.source: When attaching an Instance to one or more networks using Ports, place the security groups on the Port and not the Instance. If you place the security groups on the Instance, the security groups will not be applied upon creation, but they will be applied upon a refresh. This is a known TelefonicaOpenCloud bug.
trans-unit.target: 当使用端口将实例附加到一个或多个网络时,请将安全组放在端口上,而不是实例上。如果您将安全组放置在实例上,安全组将不会在创建时应用,但它们将在刷新时应用。这是一个已知的TelefonicaOpenCloud错误。

trans-unit.source: When authenticating via the Azure CLI, Terraform will automatically connect to the Default Subscription - this can be changed by using the Azure CLI - and is documented below.
trans-unit.target: 当通过Azure CLI进行身份验证时,Terraform将自动连接到 "默认订阅"--这可以通过使用Azure CLI进行更改--并在下面进行了说明。

trans-unit.source: When child modules each need a different configuration of a particular provider, or where the child module requires a different provider configuration than its parent, the providers argument within a module block can be used to define explicitly which provider configs are made available to the child module. For example:
trans-unit.target: 当子模块各自需要特定提供程序的不同配置，或者子模块需要与其父模块不同的提供程序配置时， module 块中的 providers 参数可用于明确定义哪些提供程序配置可用于子模块。例如：

trans-unit.source: When cloning from a template, you must specify disks of either the same or greater size than the disks in the source template when creating a traditional clone, or exactly the same size when cloning from snapshot (also known as a linked clone). For more details, see the section on creating a virtual machine from a template.
trans-unit.target: 从模板克隆时，在创建传统克隆时，必须指定与源模板中的磁盘大小相同或更大的磁盘，或者从快照克隆（也称为链接克隆）时，磁盘的大小必须完全相同。有关更多详细信息，请参阅有关从模板创建虚拟机的部分。

trans-unit.source: When combined with an automated build process running in a CI system, Terraform can help to deploy applications as AWS Lambda functions, with suitable IAM policies to connect with other AWS services for persistent storage, access to secrets, etc.
trans-unit.target: 当与运行在CI系统中的自动构建流程相结合时,Terraform可以帮助将应用程序部署为AWS Lambda函数,并采用合适的IAM策略与其他AWS服务进行连接,以实现持久存储、访问机密等。

trans-unit.source: When configuring Terraform, use either environment variables or the standard credentials file ~/.aws/credentials to provide the administrator user's IAM credentials within the administrative account to both the S3 backend and to Terraform's AWS provider.
trans-unit.target: 配置Terraform时，请使用环境变量或标准凭据文件 ~/.aws/credentials 在管理帐户中向S3后端和 Terraform的AWS提供程序提供管理员用户的IAM凭据。

trans-unit.source: When configuring a backend for the first time (moving from no defined backend to explicitly configuring one), Terraform will give you the option to migrate your state to the new backend. This lets you adopt backends without losing any existing state.
trans-unit.target: 当第一次配置一个后端时(从没有定义后端到明确配置一个后端),Terraform会给你一个选项,让你把状态迁移到新的后端。这让你在采用后端时不会丢失任何现有的状态。

trans-unit.source: When constructing a new provider from scratch, it's recommended to follow a similar repository structure as for the existing providers, with the main package in the repository root and a library package in a subdirectory named after the provider. For more information, see the custom providers guide.
trans-unit.target: 从头开始构建新的提供程序时，建议遵循与现有提供程序类似的存储库结构，主程序包位于存储库根目录中，而库程序包位于以提供程序命名的子目录中。有关更多信息，请参阅定制提供程序指南。

trans-unit.source: When creating a request type of step the additional arguments also apply:
trans-unit.target: 创建步骤的 request 类型时，其他参数也适用：

trans-unit.source: When declaring multiple instances of a resource using count, it is common to want each instance to have a different value for a given attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用 count 声明资源的多个实例时，通常希望每个实例的给定属性具有不同的值。

trans-unit.source: When depending on third-party modules, references to specific versions are recommended since this ensures that updates only happen when convenient to you.
trans-unit.target: 当依赖第三方模块时,建议参考特定的版本,因为这确保了更新只在你方便的时候发生。

trans-unit.source: When developing a provider plugin, it is recommended to use a common GOPATH that includes both the core Terraform repository and the repositories of any providers being changed. This makes it easier to use a locally-built terraform executable and a set of locally-built provider plugins together without further configuration.
trans-unit.target: 开发提供程序插件时，建议使用公共 GOPATH ，该GOPATH包括核心Terraform存储库和任何已更改的提供程序的存储库。这使得无需进一步配置即可更轻松地使用本地构建的 terraform 可执行文件和一组本地构建的提供程序插件。

trans-unit.source: When downloading modules from registry sources such as the public Terraform Registry, Terraform expects the given hostname to support the following module registry protocol.
trans-unit.target: 从诸如公共Terraform Registry之类的注册表源下载模块时，Terraform期望给定的主机名支持以下模块注册表协议。

trans-unit.source: When executing the test, the following steps are taken for each TestStep:
trans-unit.target: 执行测试时，对每个 TestStep 采取以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: When given a value, causes terraform commands to behave as if the -module-depth=VALUE flag was specified. By setting this to 0, for example, you enable commands such as plan and graph to display more compressed information.
trans-unit.target: 给定值时，将导致terraform命令的行为就像指定了 -module-depth=VALUE 标志。例如，通过将其设置为0，可以启用诸如计划和图形之类的命令以显示更多压缩信息。

trans-unit.source: When importing a Heroku cert resource, the ID must be built using the app name colon the unique ID from the Heroku API. For an app named production-api with a certificate ID of b85d9224-310b-409b-891e-c903f5a40568, you would import it as: $ terraform import heroku_cert.production_api production-api:b85d9224-310b-409b-891e-c903f5a40568.
trans-unit.target: 导入Heroku证书资源时，必须使用应用名称冒号（来自Heroku API的唯一ID）来构建ID。对于名为 production-api 且证书ID为 b85d9224-310b-409b-891e-c903f5a40568 的应用程序，您可以将其导入为： $ terraform import heroku_cert.production_api production-api:b85d9224-310b-409b-891e-c903f5a40568 。

trans-unit.source: When importing a Heroku domain resource, the ID must be built using the app name colon the unique ID from the Heroku API. For an app named production-api with a domain ID of b85d9224-310b-409b-891e-c903f5a40568, you would import it as: $ terraform import heroku_domain.production_api production-api:b85d9224-310b-409b-891e-c903f5a40568.
trans-unit.target: 导入Heroku域资源时，必须使用应用名称冒号（来自Heroku API的唯一ID）来构建ID。对于名为 production-api 且域ID为 b85d9224-310b-409b-891e-c903f5a40568 的应用，您可以将其导入为： $ terraform import heroku_domain.production_api production-api:b85d9224-310b-409b-891e-c903f5a40568 。

trans-unit.source: When importing a Heroku drain resource, the ID must be built using the app name colon the unique ID from the Heroku API. For an app named production-api with a drain ID of b85d9224-310b-409b-891e-c903f5a40568, you would import it as: $ terraform import heroku_drain.production_api production-api:b85d9224-310b-409b-891e-c903f5a40568
trans-unit.target: 导入Heroku排放资源时，必须使用应用名称冒号（来自Heroku API的唯一ID）来构建ID。对于名为 production-api 且漏极ID为 b85d9224-310b-409b-891e-c903f5a40568 的应用，您可以将其导入为： $ terraform import heroku_drain.production_api production-api:b85d9224-310b-409b-891e-c903f5a40568

trans-unit.source: When importing an existing key pair the public key material may be in any format supported by AWS. Supported formats (per the AWS documentation) are:
trans-unit.target: 导入现有密钥对时，公钥材料可以采用AWS支持的任何格式。支持的格式（根据AWS文档）为：

trans-unit.source: When importing using only the name, the provider project must be set.
trans-unit.target: 仅使用名称导入时,必须设置提供者项目。

trans-unit.source: When invoking any command that loads the Terraform configuration, Terraform loads all configuration files within the directory specified in alphabetical order.
trans-unit.target: 当调用任何加载Terraform配置的命令时,Terraform会按照字母顺序加载指定目录内的所有配置文件。

trans-unit.source: When locking support is enabled it will use LOCK and UNLOCK requests providing the lock info in the body. The endpoint should return a 423: Locked or 409: Conflict with the holding lock info when it's already taken, 200: OK for success. Any other status will be considered an error. The ID of the holding lock info will be added as a query parameter to state updates requests.
trans-unit.target: 当启用锁定支持时,它将使用LOCK和UNLOCK请求在主体中提供锁定信息。端点应该返回423:Locked或409:与持有的锁信息冲突,当它已经被占用,200:OK为成功。任何其他状态将被视为错误。持有锁信息的ID将作为一个查询参数添加到状态更新请求中。

trans-unit.source: When making changes only to files within the provider repository, it is not necessary to re-build the main Terraform executable. Note that some packages from the Terraform repository are used as library dependencies by providers, such as github.com/hashicorp/terraform/helper/schema; it is recommended to use govendor to create a local vendor copy of the relevant packages in the provider repository, as can be seen in the repositories within the terraform-providers GitHub organization.
trans-unit.target: 当只给供应商库中的文件进行修改，这是没有必要重新构建主Terraform可执行文件。请注意，Terraform信息库中的某些软件包被提供程序用作库依赖项，例如 github.com/hashicorp/terraform/helper/schema ; 建议使用 govendor 在提供者存储库中创建相关软件包的本地供应商副本，这在 terraform-providers GitHub组织内的存储库中可以看到。

trans-unit.source: When managing IAM roles, you can treat a service account either as a resource or as an identity. This resource is to add iam policy bindings to a service account resource to configure permissions for who can edit the service account. To configure permissions for a service account to act as an identity that can manage other GCP resources, use the google_project_iam set of resources.
trans-unit.target: 在管理IAM角色时，您可以将服务帐户视为资源或身份。该资源用于将iam策略绑定添加到服务帐户资源，以配置允许谁编辑服务帐户的权限。要配置服务帐户的权限以充当可以管理其他GCP资源的身份，请使用google_project_iam资源集。

trans-unit.source: When managing subnets in one of a VPC's secondary CIDR blocks created using a aws_vpc_ipv4_cidr_block_association resource, it is recommended to reference that resource's vpc_id attribute to ensure correct dependency ordering.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 aws_vpc_ipv4_cidr_block_association 资源创建的VPC的辅助CIDR块之一中管理子网时，建议参考该资源的 vpc_id 属性以确保正确的依存关系排序。

trans-unit.source: When managing the Default Network ACL, you cannot "remove" Subnets. Instead, they must be reassigned to another Network ACL, or the Subnet itself must be destroyed. Because of these requirements, removing the subnet_ids attribute from the configuration of a aws_default_network_acl resource may result in a reoccurring plan, until the Subnets are reassigned to another Network ACL or are destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 在管理默认网络ACL时，您无法“删除”子网。而是必须将它们重新分配给另一个网络ACL，否则必须将子网本身销毁。由于这些要求，从 aws_default_network_acl 资源的配置中删除 subnet_ids 属性可能会导致重复计划，直到将子网重新分配给另一个网络ACL或将其销毁为止。

trans-unit.source: When manually pushing state, Terraform will attempt to protect you from some potentially dangerous situations:
trans-unit.target: 当手动推送状态时,Terraform会试图保护你免受一些潜在的危险情况。

trans-unit.source: When multiple condition blocks are provided, they must all evaluate to true for the policy statement to apply. (In other words, the conditions are combined with the "AND" boolean operation.)
trans-unit.target: 提供多个 condition 块时，它们必须全部评估为true才能应用策略声明。（换句话说，这些条件与“ AND”布尔运算结合在一起。）

trans-unit.source: When multiple values are provided for the same input variable, map values are merged while all other values are overriden by the last definition.
trans-unit.target: 当为同一输入变量提供多个值时,地图值被合并,而所有其他值被最后一个定义覆盖。

trans-unit.source: When outputs are displayed on-screen following a terraform apply or terraform refresh, sensitive outputs are redacted, with <sensitive> displayed in place of their value.
trans-unit.target: 当在 terraform apply 或 terraform refresh 在屏幕上显示输出时，将编辑敏感的输出，并使用 <sensitive> 代替其值。

trans-unit.source: When passing boolean-like variables as parameters to resource configurations that expect boolean values, they are converted consistently:
trans-unit.target: 当把类布尔变量作为参数传递给期望有布尔值的资源配置时,它们的转换是一致的。

trans-unit.source: When plugins are automatically downloaded and installed, by default the contents are verified against an official HashiCorp release signature to ensure that they were not corrupted or tampered with during download. It is recommended to allow Terraform to make these checks, but if desired they may be disabled using the option -verify-plugins=false.
trans-unit.target: 自动下载并安装插件时，默认情况下，将根据官方的HashiCorp发行签名对内容进行验证，以确保在下载过程中未损坏或篡改内容。建议允许Terraform进行这些检查，但是如果需要，可以使用 -verify-plugins=false 选项将其禁用。

trans-unit.source: When possible, Terraform will use hardlinks or symlinks to avoid storing a separate copy of a cached plugin in multiple directories. At present, this is not supported on Windows and instead a copy is always created.
trans-unit.target: 在可能的情况下,Terraform会使用硬链接或符号链接来避免在多个目录中存储一个缓存插件的单独副本。目前,Windows不支持这样做,而是总是创建一个副本。

trans-unit.source: When provided DiffSuppressFunc will be used by Terraform to calculate the diff of this field. Common use cases are capitalization differences in string names, or logical equivalences in JSON values.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 DiffSuppressFunc ，Terraform将使用它来计算该字段的差异。常见的用例是字符串名称中的大小写差异，或JSON值中的逻辑等效项。

trans-unit.source: When refactoring an existing configuration to introduce modules, moving resource blocks between modules causes Terraform to see the new location as an entirely separate resource to the old. Always check the execution plan after performing such actions to ensure that no resources are surprisingly deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当重构现有配置以引入模块时,在模块之间移动资源块会导致Terraform将新位置视为与旧位置完全独立的资源。在执行此类操作后,一定要检查执行计划,确保没有资源被意外删除。

trans-unit.source: When referencing a security group in a configuration (for example, a configuration creates a new security group and then needs to apply it to an instance being created in the same configuration), it is currently recommended to reference the security group by name and not by ID, like this:
trans-unit.target: 当在配置中引用安全组时(例如,配置创建了一个新的安全组,然后需要将其应用于正在同一配置中创建的实例),目前建议用名称而不是ID来引用安全组,比如这样。

trans-unit.source: When referencing a security group resource in an instance resource, always use the name of the security group. If you specify the ID of the security group, Terraform will remove and reapply the security group upon each call. This is because the OpenStack Compute API returns the names of the associated security groups and not their IDs.
trans-unit.target: 在实例资源中引用安全组资源时，请始终使用安全组的名称。如果指定安全组的ID，则Terraform将在每次调用时删除并重新应用安全组。这是因为OpenStack Compute API返回了关联的安全组的名称，而不是其ID。

trans-unit.source: When running Terraform in an automation tool running on an Amazon EC2 instance, consider running this instance in the administrative account and using an instance profile in place of the various administrator IAM users suggested above. An IAM instance profile can also be granted cross-account delegation access via an IAM policy, giving this instance the access it needs to run Terraform.
trans-unit.target: 在Amazon EC2实例上运行的自动化工具中运行Terraform时，请考虑在管理帐户中运行该实例，并使用实例配置文件代替上面建议的各种管理员IAM用户。还可以通过IAM策略为IAM实例配置文件授予跨帐户委派访问权限，从而为该实例提供运行Terraform所需的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: When running a terraform plan, Terraform must know the current state of resources in order to effectively determine the changes that it needs to make to reach your desired configuration.
trans-unit.target: 运行Terraform terraform plan ，Terraform必须知道资源的当前状态，以便有效地确定为达到所需配置而需要进行的更改。

trans-unit.source: When they are passed in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 当它们按以下顺序通过时:

trans-unit.source: When to use Multiple Workspaces
trans-unit.target: 何时使用多个工作空间

trans-unit.source: When upgrading the major version of an engine, allow_major_version_upgrade must be set to true.
trans-unit.target: 升级引擎的主版本时，必须将 allow_major_version_upgrade 设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: When used in the root module of a configuration, variables can be set from CLI arguments and environment variables. For child modules, they allow values to pass from parent to child.
trans-unit.target: 在配置的根模块中使用时，可以从CLI参数和环境变量中设置变量。对于子模块，它们允许值从父代传递到子代。

trans-unit.source: When user provision first device in a facility, Packet automatically allocates IPv6/56 and private IPv4/25 blocks. The new device then gets IPv6 and private IPv4 addresses from those block. It also gets a public IPv4/31 address. Every new device in the project and facility will automatically get IPv6 and private IPv4 addresses from pre-allocated i blocks. The IPv6 and private IPv4 blocks can't be created, only imported.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在设备中配置第一台设备时,Packet会自动分配IPv6/56和私有IPv4/25块,然后新设备从这些块中获取IPv6和私有IPv4地址。然后,新设备从这些块中获取IPv6和私有IPv4地址。它还会得到一个公共IPv4/31地址。项目和设施中的每个新设备将自动从预先分配的i块中获得IPv6和私有IPv4地址。IPv6和私有IPv4块不能创建,只能导入。

trans-unit.source: When using adjustment – set the field adjustment When using percentageAdjustment - set the field adjustment When using setMaxTarget – set the field max_target_capacity When using setMinTarget – set the field min_target_capacity When using updateCapacity – set the fields minimum, maximum, and target
trans-unit.target: 使用 adjustment –设置字段 adjustment 使用 percentageAdjustment 调整时–设置字段 adjustment 使用 setMaxTarget 时 –设置字段 max_target_capacity 使用 setMinTarget 时 –设置字段 min_target_capacity 使用 updateCapacity 时 –设置字段 minimum ， maximum 和 target

trans-unit.source: When using linked_clone, the size, thin_provisioned, and eagerly_scrub settings for each disk must be an exact match to the individual disk's counterpart in the source template.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 linked_clone 时，每个磁盘的 size ， thin_provisioned 和 eagerly_scrub 设置必须与源模板中单个磁盘的副本完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: When using type = "use_support_hours" in incident_urgency_rule you have to specify exactly one otherwise optional support_hours block. Account must have the service_support_hours ability to assign support hours. The block contains the following arguments.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 type = "use_support_hours" 在 incident_urgency_rule 你必须明确指定一个可选的，否则 support_hours 块。帐户必须具有 service_support_hours 才能分配支持时间。该块包含以下参数。

trans-unit.source: When using type = "use_support_hours" in the incident_urgency_rule block you have to also specify scheduled_actions for the service. Otherwise scheduled_actions is optional.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 type = "use_support_hours" 在 incident_urgency_rule 块，你也必须指定 scheduled_actions 的服务。否则， scheduled_actions 是可选的。

trans-unit.source: When using ICMP as the ip_protocol, the from_port sets the ICMP type and the to_port sets the ICMP code. To allow all ICMP types, set each value to -1, like so:
trans-unit.target: 当使用ICMP作为 ip_protocol 时， from_port 设置ICMP 类型，而 to_port 设置ICMP 代码。要允许所有ICMP类型，请将每个值设置为 -1 ，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: When using Storage DRS through the datastore_cluster_id attribute, the entire virtual machine can be migrated from one datastore cluster to another by changing the value of this setting. In addition, when datastore_cluster_id is in use, any disks that drift to datastores outside of the datastore cluster via such actions as manual modification will be migrated back to the datastore cluster on the next apply.
trans-unit.target: 通过 datastore_cluster_id 属性使用Storage DRS时，可以通过更改此设置的值将整个虚拟机从一个数据存储群集迁移到另一个数据存储群集。另外，当 datastore_cluster_id 在使用时，任何磁盘，其经由各种行动，如手动修改漂移到数据存储群集以外的数据存储将被迁移回的数据存储群集下适用。

trans-unit.source: When using a non-administrator account to perform Terraform tasks, keep in mind that most Terraform resources perform operations in a CRUD-like fashion and require both read and write privileges to the resources they are managing. Make sure that the user has appropriate read-write access to the resources you need to work with. Read-only access should be sufficient when only using data sources on some features. You can read more about vSphere permissions and user management here.
trans-unit.target: 使用非管理员帐户执行Terraform任务时，请记住，大多数Terraform资源以类似于CRUD的方式执行操作，并且需要同时拥有对其所管理资源的读写特权。确保用户对您需要使用的资源具有适当的读写访问权限。仅在某些功能上使用数据源时，只读访问应该足够。您可以在此处阅读有关vSphere权限和用户管理的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: When using a non-local backend, Terraform will not persist the state anywhere on disk except in the case of a non-recoverable error where writing the state to the backend failed. This behavior is a major benefit for backends: if sensitive values are in your state, using a remote backend allows you to use Terraform without that state ever being persisted to disk.
trans-unit.target: 当使用非本地后端时,Terraform不会将状态持久化到磁盘上的任何地方,除非出现不可恢复的错误,将状态写入后端失败。这种行为对后端来说是一个很大的好处:如果你的状态中有敏感的值,使用远程后端可以让你在使用Terraform时不需要将状态持久化到磁盘上。

trans-unit.source: When using local state, state is stored in plain-text JSON files. When using remote state, state is only ever held in memory when used by Terraform. It may be encrypted at rest but this depends on the specific remote state backend.
trans-unit.target: 使用本地状态时，状态存储在纯文本JSON文件中。使用remote state时，仅当Terraform 使用state时，状态才会保存在内存中。它可能在静止状态下被加密，但这取决于特定的远程状态后端。

trans-unit.source: When using partial configuration, Terraform requires at a minimum that an empty backend configuration is specified in one of the root Terraform configuration files, to specify the backend type. For example:
trans-unit.target: 当使用部分配置时,Terraform至少要求在一个Terraform根配置文件中指定一个空的后台配置,以指定后台类型。比如说

trans-unit.source: When using this command, it is important to match your local Terraform version with the version selected for the target workspace in Terraform Enterprise, since otherwise the uploaded configuration archive may not be compatible with the remote Terraform process.
trans-unit.target: 使用该命令时,请务必将本地Terraform版本与Terraform Enterprise中的目标工作区所选的版本相匹配,否则上传的配置存档可能与远程Terraform进程不兼容。

trans-unit.source: When viewing a module on the registry on a tablet or desktop, usage instructions are shown on the right side. You can copy and paste this to get started with any module. Some modules have required inputs you must set before being able to use the module.
trans-unit.target: 当在平板电脑或台式机上查看注册表上的模块时,右侧会显示使用说明。您可以复制并粘贴此说明,以开始使用任何模块。有些模块在使用模块前必须设置必要的输入。

trans-unit.source: When visualizing a configuration with terraform graph, you can see all of these nodes present.
trans-unit.target: 使用 terraform graph 可视化配置时，您可以看到所有这些节点。

trans-unit.source: When you push, Terraform will automatically set the local values of your Terraform variables on Terraform Enterprise. The values are only set if they don't already exist. If you want to force push a certain variable value to update it, use the -overwrite flag.
trans-unit.target: 当你 push ，Terraform会自动设置Terraform企业的Terraform变量的局部值。仅当值不存在时才设置它们。如果要强制推送某个变量值以对其进行更新，请使用 -overwrite 标志。

trans-unit.source: Where ID is a random, never before used UUID and circonus_metric.usage is the name of the resource whose state will be populated as a result of the command.
trans-unit.target: 其中 ID 是随机的，以前从未使用过的UUID和 circonus_metric.usage 是该资源的名称，该资源的状态将由于命令而填充。

trans-unit.source: Where ID is the _cid or Circonus ID of the Check Bundle (e.g. /check_bundle/12345) and circonus_check.usage is the name of the resource whose state will be populated as a result of the command.
trans-unit.target: 其中， ID 是Check Bundle 的 _cid 或Circonus ID（例如 /check_bundle/12345 ）， circonus_check.usage 是该资源的名称，该资源的状态将根据命令进行填充。

trans-unit.source: Where ID is the _cid or Circonus ID of the Contact Group (e.g. /contact_group/12345) and circonus_contact_group.myteam is the name of the resource whose state will be populated as a result of the command.
trans-unit.target: 其中， ID 是联系人组的 _cid 或Circonus ID（例如 /contact_group/12345 ）， circonus_contact_group.myteam 是资源的名称，该资源的状态将根据命令进行填充。

trans-unit.source: Where ID is the _cid or Circonus ID of the Metric Cluster (e.g. /metric_cluster/12345) and circonus_metric_cluster.mymetriccluster is the name of the resource whose state will be populated as a result of the command.
trans-unit.target: 其中， ID 是度量标准集群的 _cid 或Circonus ID（例如 /metric_cluster/12345 ）， circonus_metric_cluster.mymetriccluster 是资源的名称，该资源的状态将根据命令进行填充。

trans-unit.source: Where ID is the _cid or Circonus ID of the Rule Set (e.g. /rule_set/201285_maximum) and circonus_rule_set.icmp-latency-alert is the name of the resource whose state will be populated as a result of the command.
trans-unit.target: 其中， ID 是规则集的 _cid 或Circonus ID（例如 /rule_set/201285_maximum ）， circonus_rule_set.icmp-latency-alert 是资源的名称，该资源的状态将根据命令进行填充。

trans-unit.source: Where ID is the _cid or Circonus ID of the graph (e.g. /graph/bd72aabc-90b9-4039-cc30-c9ab838c18f5) and circonus_graph.icmp-graph is the name of the resource whose state will be populated as a result of the command.
trans-unit.target: 其中 ID 是图表的 _cid 或马戏团ID（例如 /graph/bd72aabc-90b9-4039-cc30-c9ab838c18f5 ），而 circonus_graph.icmp-graph 是资源的名称，该资源的状态将根据命令进行填充。

trans-unit.source: Where my_schema is the name of the schema in the PostgreSQL database and postgresql_schema.schema_foo is the name of the resource whose state will be populated as a result of the command.
trans-unit.target: 其中 my_schema 是PostgreSQL数据库中架构的名称，而 postgresql_schema.schema_foo 是资源的名称，该资源的状态将根据命令进行填充。

trans-unit.source: Where replication_name is the name of the role to import and postgresql_role.replication_role is the name of the resource whose state will be populated as a result of the command.
trans-unit.target: 其中 replication_name 是要导入的角色的名称，而 postgresql_role.replication_role 是将通过命令填充其状态的资源的名称。

trans-unit.source: Where testdb1 is the name of the database to import and postgresql_database.db1 is the name of the resource whose state will be populated as a result of the command.
trans-unit.target: 其中， testdb1 是要导入的数据库的名称，而 postgresql_database.db1 是资源的名称，该资源的状态将根据命令进行填充。

trans-unit.source: Where a shared Consul cluster is available, use consul_key_prefix to publish to the key/value store and consul_keys to retrieve those values in other configurations.
trans-unit.target: 如果有可用的共享Consul群集，请使用 consul_key_prefix 发布到键/值存储，并使用 consul_keys 检索其他配置中的那些值。

trans-unit.source: Where multiple configurations are representing distinct system components rather than multiple deployments, data can be passed from one component to another using paired resources types and data sources. For example:
trans-unit.target: 当多个配置代表不同的系统组件而不是多个部署时,可以使用配对的资源类型和数据源将数据从一个组件传递到另一个组件。例如:

trans-unit.source: Where the file pubkey in the current directory contains only the public key of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 该文件 pubkey 在当前目录仅包含公钥证书。

trans-unit.source: While terraform push sends your configuration to be managed by Terraform Enterprise, the remote state backend does not have to be Terraform Enterprise. It can be anything as long as it is accessible by the public internet, since Terraform Enterprise will need to be able to communicate to it.
trans-unit.target: 当 terraform push 将您的配置发送到Terraform Enterprise进行管理时，远程状态后端不必是Terraform Enterprise。只要它可以通过公共Internet访问，它就可以是任何东西，因为Terraform Enterprise将需要能够与其通信。

trans-unit.source: While in principle provider blocks can appear in any module, it is recommended that they be placed only in the root module of a configuration, since this approach allows users to configure providers just once and re-use them across all descendent modules.
trans-unit.target: 尽管原则上 provider 块可以出现在任何模块中，但建议仅将它们放置在配置的根模块中，因为这种方法允许用户仅配置一次提供程序并在所有后代模块中重复使用它们。

trans-unit.source: While managing the underlying Kubernetes cluster configuration is beyond the scope of this guide, we provide an example of how to apply the required Kubernetes ConfigMap via kubectl below for completeness.
trans-unit.target: 虽然管理基础Kubernetes集群配置不在本指南的讨论范围内，但为了完整 kubectl ，我们提供了一个示例，说明如何通过下面的kubectl应用所需的Kubernetes ConfigMap 。

trans-unit.source: While not explicitly discussed here, data sources are a special subset of resources which are read-only. They are resolved earlier than regular resources and can be used as part of Terraform's interpolation.
trans-unit.target: 虽然此处没有明确讨论，但数据源是只读的资源的特殊子集。它们比常规资源早解决，可以用作Terraform插值的一部分。

trans-unit.source: While remote state is a convenient, built-in mechanism for sharing data between configurations, it is also possible to use more general stores to pass settings both to other configurations and to other consumers. For example, if your environment has HashiCorp Consul then you can have one Terraform configuration that writes to Consul using consul_key_prefix and then another that consumes those values using the consul_keys data source.
trans-unit.target: 虽然远程状态是在配置之间共享数据的便捷的内置机制，但也可以使用更通用的存储将设置传递给其他配置和其他使用者。例如，如果你的环境有HashiCorp领事那么你可以有写入领事使用一个Terraform配置 consul_key_prefix 然后又消耗使用这些值的 consul_keys 数据源。

trans-unit.source: Workspaces are managed with the terraform workspace set of commands. To create a new workspace and switch to it, you can use terraform workspace new; to switch environments you can use terraform workspace select; etc.
trans-unit.target: 使用 terraform workspace 命令集管理工作空间。要创建一个新的工作区并切换到它，可以使用 terraform workspace new 。要切换环境，您可以使用 terraform workspace select ; 等等

trans-unit.source: Workspaces are technically equivalent to renaming your state file. They aren't any more complex than that. Terraform wraps this simple notion with a set of protections and support for remote state.
trans-unit.target: 工作空间在技术上相当于重新命名你的状态文件。它们并没有比这更复杂。Terraform用一套保护措施和对远程状态的支持来包装这个简单的概念。

trans-unit.target: 您也可以在同一文档中组合 source_json 和 override_json 。

trans-unit.source: You can also do custom properties * custom_property_name - (Required if using filters and custom properties) The name of filtered custom property. * operator - (Required if using filters) The type of operator. * custom_property_value - (Required if using filters and custom properties) The value of the filtered custom property.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以执行自定义属性* custom_property_name -（如果使用过滤器和自定义属性，则为必需）已过滤的自定义属性的名称。* operator -（如果使用过滤器，则为必填）运算符的类型。* custom_property_value -（如果使用过滤器和自定义属性，则为必需）已过滤的自定义属性的值。

trans-unit.source: You can also gain all the benefits of the registry for private modules by signing up for a private registry.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过注册一个获得注册的私人模块的所有好处，私有注册。

trans-unit.source: You can also manually write state with terraform state push. This is extremely dangerous and should be avoided if possible. This will overwrite the remote state. This can be used to do manual fixups if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用 terraform state push 手动写入状态。这是非常危险的，应尽可能避免。这将覆盖远程状态。如有必要，可以使用它进行手动修复。

trans-unit.source: You can also publish your own modules on the Terraform Registry. You may use the public registry for public modules. For private modules, you can use a Private Registry, or reference repositories and other sources directly. Some features are available only for registry modules, such as versioning and documentation generation.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在Terraform Registry上发布自己的模块。您可以将公共注册表用于公共模块。对于私有模块，您可以使用私有注册表，或直接引用存储库和其他来源。某些功能仅适用于注册表模块，例如版本控制和文档生成。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify branches and version with the ?ref query, and use HTTPS or SSH:

trans-unit.source: You can also use modules from a private registry, like the one provided by Terraform Enterprise. Private registry modules have source strings of the form <HOSTNAME>/<NAMESPACE>/<NAME>/<PROVIDER>. This is the same format as the public registry, but with an added hostname prefix.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用私有注册表中的模块，例如Terraform Enterprise提供的模块。专用注册表模块的源字符串格式为 <HOSTNAME>/<NAMESPACE>/<NAME>/<PROVIDER> 。这与公共注册表的格式相同，但是带有添加的主机名前缀。

trans-unit.source: You can also use protocols such as HTTP or SSH to reference a module, but you'll have specify to Terraform that it is a Git module, by prefixing the URL with git:: like so:
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用HTTP或SSH之类的协议来引用模块，但是您需要通过给URL加上 git:: 前缀来向Terraform指定它是Git模块：
